page.title: 08Harvest Festival
page.content: Many festivals are celebrated in our school through the year. The harvest festivals in which schools take part are held in August and September. Everyone is asked to bring in a couple of items, a big display is made in the hall and every one admires it. At the end of the day some fourth years are asked to carry a box of goods to some old people. The Church also celebrates the Harvest festival. Round about the church flowers and sheaves of corn and barley are placed to decorate the church. The Harvest festival celebrates the food that was brought in for the winter stores, like crops, apples, and home made wine and cheese.
